root.description: OverviewAvernum 2 is the sequel to the hit retro-rpg Avernum. Avernum 2, like its predecessor, is a classic fantasy role-playing game.A remake of this game was done and part of the Avernum: escape from the pit which has a better graphic engine.Windows system requirements:PC Running Windows 95 or laterDirectX 3 or later30 MB free RAM25 MB hard drive space800x600 screen resolution with 16 bit color.Macintosh system requirements:OS X 10.3.9 or later30 MB free RAM25 MB hard drive space800x600 screen resolution with 32 bit colorGeneforge is Universal and runs natively on Intel Macintoshes.
